author: Anastasia Moloney
title: Lockdown broken in El Salvador as crowds gather for government aid
description: BOGOTA (Thomson Reuters Foundation) - Police in El Salvador on Monday used pepper spray to disperse crowds of people seeking government subsidies to help them survive the coronavirus pandemic, drawing criticism about the way financial aid was being distribute…
